title: Flotilla
description: Paya Doshi is a woman obsessed with helping those in need. She runs the Flotilla Project with her best friend, none other than Tabby Cat herself, international pop sensation.Paya stumbles upon a woman in need on the streets, Angie Wells, who she quickly finds is an amazing woman in her own right.In her own unique way, Paya helps Angie to stand back on her own feet again, and helps Angie to navigate life and love when she introduces her to a woman, Stephanie, and her children.(The London Harmony series is a spinoff of the Music of the Soul books.)
author: Erik Schubach
